text: Vilen Tokarev (11 November 1934 â€“ 4 August 2019), known professionally as Willi Tokarev, was a Russian-American singer-songwriter. He was known for his 80s music about life as a Russian immigrant in New York. In 1973, Tokarev's song "Murmanchanochka" ("Murmansk Girl") became a huge local hit. Tokarev died on August 4, 2019 from cancer in Moscow, aged 84. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Russian singer-songwriters Category:21st- century Russian singers Category:21st-century Russian songwriters
title: Willi Tokarev
